checkout.title: My Data
checkout.info: Please enter your personal data and press continue

checkoutOrder.title: Payment
checkoutOrder.info: After making the payment you will receive a confirmation email with details of your purchase
checkoutOrder.info2: You will be redirected to a secure payment platform. This is a secure process. The validation of your payment can take up to 24 hours.

checkoutPaid.title: Order Created
checkoutPaid.info: Congratulations, your payment was successful. Shortly a confirmation email will arrive to your inbox
